column4: hello i`m trying to decode some files from flac to wav, my command is [ for i in *.flac; do flac -d "$i"; done] but.. how can i do this recursivly down through folders?
while read -r -d '' i; do flac -d "$i"; done < <(find . -type f -iname "*.flac")
or perhaps.  find . -type f -iname "*.flac" -exec bash -c 'for i; do flac -d "$i"; done' _ {} +
thanks i`ll give them a try..
